nodes.text: Ten gunned down in southern Alabama. At least seventeen gunned down in Germany. On Monday, March 9, 2009, some twenty-seven human beings were living, breathing, going about their respective businesses. They are no more.

I know ... I know. I agree with you that it's sad more of those people couldn't or didn't take advantage of concealed carry to help prevent so many deaths. That needs to change along with education so more people can defend themselves.
